ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:39:41 urn:comixology:786243 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:55:39. [Issue ID 2015140]
ComicInfo.Summary:
A DEADLY FORCE CLOSES IN ON VALERIA!
VALERIA'S quest for revenge brings her one step closer to her brother's killer...
But a mysterious stranger with deadly intent has picked up her trail!
And what secrets do the Knights of MITRA hold, and how do they link to Valeria's past?
Plus: The next chapter of an all-new novella featuring one of CONAN's greatest nemeses-the wizard THOTH-AMON!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|-----------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Jay Anacleto & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino | 2 |
Note: Includes the second part in a five part The Fall of Thoth-Amon novella by Matt Forbeck.
ComicInfo.Title: Valeria, Chapter Two: Warrior of Aquilonia
